document.forum_title: Jammu Kashmir Latest News | Tourism | Breaking News J&K
document.discussion_title: We got special kind of relationship, Montana on Khloe
document.topic_text: We got special kind of relationship, Montana on Khloe LOS ANGELES, Apr 25: Musician French Montana, who dated Khloe Kardashian, says he will be friends forever with the TV personality as they share a special bond.“We’re gonna be friends forever, me and Khloe. We got a special kind of relationship. That’s one of my best friends,” he said. Montana has “something special” coming out with Kanye West in two weeks. When asked to elaborate on the project, he said, “I want it to be a surprise. I love working with him. He’s an icon.” The two most recently worked together on Montana’s song “Figure It Out,” which also featured rapper Nas, reported People magazine. (PTI) Share this:
